title: AGROTECH -  the International Fair of Agricultural Techniques

tasks.task: Arrive at a parking lot to park the combine.
subtasks: Drive the vehicle towards the parking area.
Align the combine with the parking space.

tasks.task: Park the combine and ensure safety.
Adjust seat and mirrors for visibility.
subtasks: Adjust the driver's seat to a comfortable position.
Position rearview and side mirrors for optimal visibility.
